content:
Distributed Authoring History (cont’d)

Distributed Authoring History (cont’d)

  • 1995/96: Rohit Khare at W3C researches a leasing and locking mechanism
    • http://xent.w3.org/~khare/6.852%20Project.htmld/index.html
  • March 1996: Dan Connolly puts out a call for volunteers to coordinate distributed authoring activity
    • Jim Whitehead, U.C. Irvine, volunteers
  • June 1996: IETF HTTP working group completes internet draft of HTTP/1.1
    • PUT method is part of standard
